LABEL: ext.carpi radialis
DESCRIPTION: 1.Craniolateral aspect of the mid-belly of the extensor carpi radialis muscle at the height of the elbow

LABEL: radio-carpal joint
DESCRIPTION: 2. Radial carpal bone+radius medial to extensor carpi radialis tendon

LABEL: intermediate carpal bone
DESCRIPTION: 3.Intermediate carpal bone+3rd carpal bone lateral to extensor carpi radialis tendon

LABEL: accessory carpal bone
DESCRIPTION: 4. Lateral aspect of mid-body of accessory carpal bone near m.ulnaris lat. tendon

LABEL: carpo-metacarpal joint
DESCRIPTION: 5.3rd carpal bone+ metacarpal bone medial to extensor carpi radialis tendon

LABEL: metacarpal bone
DESCRIPTION: 6.Dorsal 1/3 MCIII medial to digital extensor tendon

LABEL: coronary band
DESCRIPTION: 7.Dorsal-most aspect of the coronary band, lateral to m.extensor digitalis communis

LABEL: CPS
DECODE: <20 no symptoms of pain being shown
